history.proof: intros o1 o2 o3 Hosub1 Hosub2 a2 HO2. specialize (Hosub2 a2 HO2) as [a3 [HO3 Hsub2]]. intros; subst. exists a3. split. - shelve. - shelve.

ctx: intros o1 o2 o3 Hosub1 Hosub2 a2 HO2.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 o1, o2, o3 : option A Hosub1 : osub o1 o2 Hosub2 : osub o2 o3 a2 : A HO2 : o3 = Some a2 The term "HO2" has type "o3 = Some a2" while it is expected to have type "o2 = Some a2".

ctx: intros o1 o2 o3 Hosub1 Hosub2 a2 HO2.
exceptions.tactic: apply (osub_Some_inversion o1 a2) in Hsub1 as [a1' [HO1' Hsub1']].

ctx: intros o1 o2 o3 Hosub1 Hosub2 a2 HO2.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
sub: A -> A -> Prop
sub_reflexive: forall a : A, sub a a
sub_transitive: forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3

Goal:
forall o1 o2 o3 : option A, osub o1 o2 -> osub o2 o3 -> osub o1 o3

Premises:
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
osub = fun o1 o2 : option A => forall a2 : A, o2 = Some a2 -> exists a1 : A, o1 = Some a1 /\ sub a1 a2 : option A -> option A -> Prop
Tauto.I : Tauto.GFormula -> option ?AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?TX : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?AA : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?AF : [A : Type sub : A -> A ->...-> sub a1 a3 |- Type]

Tauto.D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?TX : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?AA : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?AF : [A : Type sub : A -> A ->...-> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
Tauto.A : ?TA -> ?AA -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?TX : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?AA : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?AF : [A : Type sub : A -> A ->...-> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
Tauto.Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?TX : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?AA : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?AF : [A : Type sub : A -> A ->...-> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
ssrfun.comp : (?B -> ?A) -> (?C -> ?B) -> ?C -> ?A where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?B : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?C : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
Tauto.ocons : option ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
Tauto.GFormula_rect : forall P : Tauto.GFormula -> Type, P Tauto.TT -> P Tauto.FF -> (forall t : ?TX, P (Tauto.X t)) -> (forall (t : ?TA) (a : ?AA), P (Tauto.A t a)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.Cj g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.D g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> P (Tauto.N g)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall (o : option ?AF) (g0 : Tauto.GFormula), P g0 -> P (Tauto.I g o g0)) -> forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g where ?TA : [A : Type sub : A -> A ->...-> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
Tauto.GFormula_ind : forall P : Tauto.GFormula -> Prop, P Tauto.TT -> P Tauto.FF -> (forall t : ?TX, P (Tauto.X t)) -> (forall (t : ?TA) (a : ?AA), P (Tauto.A t a)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.Cj g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.D g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> P (Tauto.N g)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall (o : option ?AF) (g0 : Tauto.GFormula), P g0 -> P (Tauto.I g o g0)) -> forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g where ?TA : [A : Type sub : A -> A ->...-> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
osub_Some_inversion : forall (o1 : option A) (a2 : A), osub o1 (Some a2) -> exists a1 : A, o1 = Some a1 /\ sub a1 a2
osub_Some_Some : forall a1 a2 : A, sub a1 a2 -> osub (Some a1) (Some a2)
osub_None_Some : forall a2 : A, osub None (Some a2) -> False
subsume = fun e1 e2 : env A => forall x : nat, osub (lookup x e1) (lookup x e2) : env A -> env A -> Prop
osub_reflexive : forall o : option A, osub o o
osub_None : forall o : option A, osub o None
nth_error_split : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (n : nat) (a : A), nth_error l n = Some a -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ a :: l2 /\ length l1 = n
Setoid.Seq_sym : forall (A : Type) (Aeq : Relation_Definitions.relation A), Setoid.Setoid_Theory A Aeq -> forall x y : A, Aeq x y -> Aeq y x
Setoid.Seq_trans : forall (A : Type) (Aeq : Relation_Definitions.relation A), Setoid.Setoid_Theory A Aeq -> forall x y z : A, Aeq x y -> Aeq y z -> Aeq x z
NoDup_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, NoDup l -> P l
Setoid.Seq_refl : forall (A : Type) (Aeq : Relation_Definitions.relation A), Setoid.Setoid_Theory A Aeq -> forall x : A, Aeq x x
Tauto.radd_term_term : forall (Term' Annot : Type) (unsat : Term' -> bool) (deduce : Term' -> Term' -> option Term') (a' : Tauto.clause Term' Annot) (a : Term' * Annot) (cl : Tauto.clause Term' Annot), Tauto.radd_term unsat deduce a a' = inl cl -> Tauto.add_term unsat deduce a a' = Some cl
agree_below : forall (A : Type) (e1 e2 : env A) (x : nat) (a : A) (k : nat), lookup x e1 = Some a -> x < k -> agree e1 e2 k -> lookup x e2 = Some a
raw_insert : forall A : Type, nat -> option A -> env A -> env A
ssrfun.pcomp : forall A B C : Type, (B -> option A) -> (C -> option B) -> C -> option A
RingMicromega.map_option2 : forall A B C : Type, (A -> B -> option C) -> option A -> option B -> option C
nth_error : forall A : Type, list A -> nat -> option A
lookup : forall A : Type, nat -> env A -> option A
fold : forall A B : Type, (option A -> B -> B) -> env A -> B -> B
Record div_theory (R : Type) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (C : Type) (cadd cmul : C -> C -> C) (phi : C -> R) (cdiv : C -> C -> C * C) : Prop := mkdiv_th { div_eucl_th : forall a b : C, let (q, r) := cdiv a b in req (phi a) (phi (cadd (cmul b q) r)) } Arguments Ring_theory.div_theory [R]%type_scope _%function_scope [C]%type_scope (_ _ _ _)%function_scope Arguments Ring_theory.mkdiv_th [R]%type_scope _%function_scope [C]%type_scope (_ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
agree : forall A : Type, env A -> env A -> nat -> Prop
lookup_empty_Some : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (a : A), lookup x (empty A) = Some a -> False
hd : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> A
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
BinList.jump : forall A : Type, positive -> list A -> list A
map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> env A -> list (option B)
ssrfun.pcan_pcomp : forall (A B C : Type) (f : B -> A) (h : C -> B) (f' : A -> option B) (h' : B -> option C), ssrfun.pcancel f f' -> ssrfun.pcancel h h' -> ssrfun.pcancel (ssrfun.comp f h) (ssrfun.pcomp h' f')
length_insert_reverse_1 : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (k x : nat) (a : A), length (insert x a e) <= k -> x < k

```intros o1 o2 o3 Hosub1 Hosub2 a2 HO2. specialize (Hosub1 a2 HO2) as [a1 [HO1 Hsub1]].
specialize (Hosub2 a2 HO2) as [a3 [HO3 Hsub2]].
apply (osub_Some_inversion o1 a2) in Hsub1 as [a1' [HO1' Hsub1']].
rewrite HO1' in HO1. injection HO1. intros; subst. exists a3. split. assumption. apply (sub_transitive a1 a2 a3); assumption.```

original: intros o1 o2 o3 Hosub1 Hosub2 a2 HO2. specialize (Hosub1 a2 HO2) as [a1 [HO1 Hsub1]]. specialize (Hosub2 a2 HO2) as [a3 [HO3 Hsub2]]. apply (osub_Some_inversion o1 a2) in Hsub1 as [a1' [HO1' Hsub1']]. rewrite HO1' in HO1. injection HO1. intros; subst. exists a3. split. auto. apply (sub_transitive a1 a2 a3); auto.
